Text:

Thanks for quick upload, too bad speed is slow due to it just having been uploaded!

Thumbs up though! Shingeki no Kyojin
Listed as having English subs but after the opening theme none were displayed
This is an unexpectedly good show! I do not remember how I stumbled on it but I feel like I stumbled on anime gold. The descriptions of this show do it no justice.
I'm not getting any subs beyond the opening theme either
